Content:
# smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm

A smart Wezterm workspace switcher inspired by [t-smart-tmux-session-manager](https://github.com/joshmedeski/t-smart-tmux-session-manager) and its successor [sesh](https://github.com/joshmedeski/sesh)

## Usage

üí® Level up your workflow by switching between workspaces ‚ö° ***BLAZINGLY FAST*** ‚ö° with 1Ô∏è‚É£ keypress, the power of fuzzy finding and zoxide! üí®

![Demo gif](https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm/assets/75012728/a4f82fcf-5304-4891-a1e2-346767678dc6)

## Dependencies

* zoxide

### Setup

1. Require the plugin:
Translation:
# smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm

Un cambiador inteligente de espacios de trabajo para Wezterm inspirado en [t-smart-tmux-session-manager](https://github.com/joshmedeski/t-smart-tmux-session-manager) y su sucesor [sesh](https://github.com/joshmedeski/sesh)

## Uso

üí® Mejora tu flujo de trabajo cambiando entre espacios de trabajo ‚ö° ***R√ÅPIDAMENTE*** ‚ö° con 1Ô∏è‚É£ pulsaci√≥n de tecla, el poder de la b√∫squeda difusa y zoxide! üí®

![Demo gif](https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm/assets/75012728/a4f82fcf-5304-4891-a1e2-346767678dc6)

## Dependencias

* zoxide

### Configuraci√≥n

1. Requiere el complemento:

Content:
```lua
    local wezterm = require("wezterm")
    local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
    ```
Translation:
```lua
    local wezterm = require("wezterm")
    local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
    ```

Content: 2. Apply the default keybinding to the config:
Translation: 2. Aplica la asignaci√≥n de teclas predeterminada a la configuraci√≥n:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: 2. Aplica la asignaci√≥n de teclas predeterminada a la configuraci√≥n:

RowTranslations.originContent: 2. Apply the default keybinding to the config:

Content:
```lua
    workspace_switcher.apply_to_config(config)
    ```
Translation:
```lua
    workspace_switcher.apply_to_config(config)
    ```

Or create your own keybinding, see [Configuration - Keybinding](#Keybinding).

Content:
#### Changing the Default Workspace Name
You can set a default workspace name:
Translation:
#### Cambiar el nombre predeterminado del espacio de trabajo
Puedes establecer un nombre predeterminado para el espacio de trabajo:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: #### Cambiar el nombre predeterminado del espacio de trabajo

RowTranslations.originContent: You can set a default workspace name:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Puedes establecer un nombre predeterminado para el espacio de trabajo:

Content:
```lua
config.default_workspace = "~"
```
Translation:
```lua
config.default_workspace = "~"
```

Content:
#### Additional Filtering

You can include `extra_args` in the call to `switch_workspace` to filter the results of the zoxide query further. The `extra_args` is just a string concatenated to the command like so: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. For example, to select projects from a predefined list in `~/.projects`, call the plugin like this:
Translation:
#### Filtrado Adicional

Puedes incluir `extra_args` en la llamada a `switch_workspace` para filtrar a√∫n m√°s los resultados de la consulta de zoxide. El `extra_args` es simplemente una cadena concatenada al comando de esta forma: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. Por ejemplo, para seleccionar proyectos de una lista predefinida en `~/.projects`, llama al plugin as√≠:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Puedes incluir `extra_args` en la llamada a `switch_workspace` para filtrar a√∫n m√°s los resultados de la consulta de zoxide. El `extra_args` es simplemente una cadena concatenada al comando de esta forma: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. Por ejemplo, para seleccionar proyectos de una lista predefinida en `~/.projects`, llama al plugin as√≠:

RowTranslations.originContent: You can include `extra_args` in the call to `switch_workspace` to filter the results of the zoxide query further. The `extra_args` is just a string concatenated to the command like so: `zoxide query -l <extra_args>`. For example, to select projects from a predefined list in `~/.projects`, call the plugin like this:

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.switch_workspace({ extra_args = " | rg -Fxf ~/.projects" })
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.switch_workspace({ extra_args = " | rg -Fxf ~/.projects" })
  ```

Content:
#### Changing elements of the fuzzy finder

You can change the list of elements of the fuzzy finder by setting a new function for `get_choices` likes so:
Translation:
#### Cambiar elementos del buscador difuso

Puedes cambiar la lista de elementos del buscador difuso configurando una nueva funci√≥n para `get_choices` de la siguiente manera:

RowTranslations.originContent: #### Changing elements of the fuzzy finder

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Puedes cambiar la lista de elementos del buscador difuso configurando una nueva funci√≥n para `get_choices` de la siguiente manera:

RowTranslations.originContent: You can change the list of elements of the fuzzy finder by setting a new function for `get_choices` likes so:

Content:
```lua
local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
workspace_switcher.get_choices = function(opts)
  -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
  return workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({})
end
```
Translation:
```lua
local workspace_switcher = wezterm.plugin.require("https://github.com/MLFlexer/smart_workspace_switcher.wezterm")
workspace_switcher.get_choices = function(opts)
  -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
  return workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({})
end
```

RowTranslations.originContent: -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results
RowTranslations.translatedContent: -- this will ONLY show the workspace elements, NOT the Zoxide results

Content: By default the function uses the following functions to create a list:
Translation: Por defecto, la funci√≥n utiliza las siguientes funciones para crear una lista:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Por defecto, la funci√≥n utiliza las siguientes funciones para crear una lista:

RowTranslations.originContent: By default the function uses the following functions to create a list:

Content:
```lua
workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({ id: string, label: string }[])
workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)
```
Translation:
```lua
workspace_switcher.choices.get_workspace_elements({ id: string, label: string }[])
workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)
```

RowTranslations.originContent: workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)
RowTranslations.translatedContent: workspace_switcher.choices.get_zoxide_elements({ id: string, label: string }[], {extra_args?: string, workspace_ids?: workspace_ids}?)

Content:
#### Updating the Right Status with the Path

To add the selected path to the right status bar, use the `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` event emitted when choosing a workspace:
Translation:
#### Actualizando el estado derecho con la ruta

Para agregar la ruta seleccionada a la barra de estado derecha, utiliza el evento `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` emitido al elegir un espacio de trabajo:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: #### Actualizando el estado derecho con la ruta

RowTranslations.originContent: #### Updating the Right Status with the Path

RowTranslations.translatedContent: Para agregar la ruta seleccionada a la barra de estado derecha, utiliza el evento `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` emitido al elegir un espacio de trabajo:

RowTranslations.originContent: To add the selected path to the right status bar, use the `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` event emitted when choosing a workspace:

Content:
#### Events

The following events are available and can be used to trigger custom behavior:

* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - Triggered when the fuzzy finder starts.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.canceled` - Triggered if no element is chosen.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.selected` - Triggered when an element is selected.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - Triggered after creating and switching to a new workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - Triggered after switching to a workspace.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.switched_to_prev` - Triggered after switching to a previous workspace.

> [!NOTE]
> The `created` and `chosen` events emit [MuxWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/mux-window/) objects while the others emit [GuiWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/window/index.html) objects. 

Example usage:
Translation:
#### Eventos

Los siguientes eventos est√°n disponibles y pueden usarse para activar comportamientos personalizados:

* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - Se activa cuando el buscador difuso comienza.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.canceled` - Se activa si no se elige ning√∫n elemento.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.selected` - Se activa cuando se selecciona un elemento.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - Se activa despu√©s de crear y cambiar a un nuevo espacio de trabajo.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - Se activa despu√©s de cambiar a un espacio de trabajo.
* `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.switched_to_prev` - Se activa despu√©s de cambiar a un espacio de trabajo anterior.

> [!NOTA]
> Los eventos `created` y `chosen` emiten objetos [MuxWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/mux-window/) mientras que los otros emiten objetos [GuiWindow](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/window/index.html). 

Ejemplo de uso:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: * `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.start` - Se activa cuando el buscador difuso comienza.

RowTranslations.originContent: * `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.created` - Triggered after creating and switching to a new workspace.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: * `smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen` - Se activa despu√©s de cambiar a un espacio de trabajo.

Content:
```lua
  wezterm.on("smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen", function(window, workspace)
    wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")
  end)
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  wezterm.on("smart_workspace_switcher.workspace_switcher.chosen", function(window, workspace)
    wezterm.log_info("THIS IS EMITTED FROM THE CALLBACK")
  end)
  ```

Content:
#### Workspace Formatter

Set a custom workspace formatter using the following example. For more information, see the [Wezterm formatting docs](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):
Translation:
#### Formateador de espacio de trabajo

Establezca un formateador personalizado para el espacio de trabajo usando el siguiente ejemplo. Para m√°s informaci√≥n, consulte la [documentaci√≥n de formateo de Wezterm](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):

RowTranslations.originContent: Set a custom workspace formatter using the following example. For more information, see the [Wezterm formatting docs](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Establezca un formateador personalizado para el espacio de trabajo usando el siguiente ejemplo. Para m√°s informaci√≥n, consulte la [documentaci√≥n de formateo de Wezterm](https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/config/lua/wezterm/format.html):

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.workspace_formatter = function(label)
    return wezterm.format({
      { Attribute = { Italic = true } },
      { Foreground = { Color = "green" } },
      { Background = { Color = "black" } },
      { Text = "Û±Ç¨: " .. label },
    })
  end
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.workspace_formatter = function(label)
    return wezterm.format({
      { Attribute = { Italic = true } },
      { Foreground = { Color = "green" } },
      { Background = { Color = "black" } },
      { Text = "Û±Ç¨: " .. label },
    })
  end
  ```

Content:
#### Zoxide Path

To define a custom path to `zoxide`:
Translation:
#### Ruta de Zoxide

Para definir una ruta personalizada a `zoxide`:

RowTranslations.originContent: To define a custom path to `zoxide`:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Para definir una ruta personalizada a `zoxide`:

Content:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.zoxide_path = "/path/to/zoxide"
  ```
Translation:
```lua
  workspace_switcher.zoxide_path = "/path/to/zoxide"
  ```
